document.heading: Mortgage Lender and Broker Act of 1996 Time Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-257, the “Mortgage Lender and Broker Act of 1996 Time Extension Temporary Amendment Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-922, which was retained by CounciL. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 1996, and December 3, 1996, respectively. It was assigned Act No. 11-507 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-257 became effective on April 9, 1997.
